***по.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> (16)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*<a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> Proto-Indo-European <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*h₂pó</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:preposition.html>Preposition</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a></span>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:up.html>up</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:till.html>till</a></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">indicates <a href = vnd.unilang:distribution.html>distribution</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:other.html>other</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:than.html>than</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:thousand.html>thousand</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:million.html>million</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:billion.html>billion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:trillion.html>trillion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:etc.html>etc</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:compound.html>compound</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>these</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:word.html>words</a>)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a>) / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:двести.html>две́сти</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>pó</b> dva (dve) / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> dvésti</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:hundred.html>hundred</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:each.html>each</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dative.html>dative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a></span>

<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:нанести.html>нанести́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удар.html>уда́р</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ядерный.html>я́дерным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:объект.html>объе́ктам</a> ира́на</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">nanestí udár <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> jádernym obʺjéktam Irána</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:launch.html>launch</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:strike.html>strike</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:iran.html>Iran</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nuclear.html>nuclear</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ambition.html>ambitions</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">indicates <a href = vnd.unilang:repetition.html>repetition</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:time.html>time</a></span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:четверг.html>четверга́м</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> četvergám</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> Thursdays (<a href = vnd.unilang:every.html>every</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:thursday.html>Thursday</a>)</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">indicates <a href = vnd.unilang:distribution.html>distribution</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:thousand.html>thousand</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:million.html>million</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:billion.html>billion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:trillion.html>trillion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:etc.html>etc</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:compound.html>compound</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>these</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:word.html>words</a>)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одному́</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одно́й</a>) / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:тысяча.html>ты́сяче</a> / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:миллион.html>миллио́ну</a> / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:миллиард.html>миллиа́рду</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> odnomú (odnój) / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> týsjače / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> milliónu / <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a></b> milliárdu</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:thousand.html>thousand</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:million.html>million</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:billion.html>billion</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:each.html>each</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:prepositional.html>prepositional</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a></span>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes"><a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>Usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>notes</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href = vnd.unilang:when.html>When</a> used <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:distributive.html>distributive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sense.html>sense</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:following.html>following</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:should.html>should</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>noted</a>:
<ul><li><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numeral</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dative.html>dative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:thousand.html>thousand</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:million.html>million</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:billion.html>billion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:trillion.html>trillion</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:etc.html>etc</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:compound.html>compound</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>these</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:word.html>words</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:e.html>e</a>.<a href = vnd.unilang:g.html>g</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:twenty-one.html>twenty-one</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:inanimate.html>inanimate</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:even.html>even</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:animate.html>animate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>nouns</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:remainder.html>remainder</a>.
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>да́л</a> им <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пя́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:рубль.html>рубле́й</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ja.html>Ja</a> dal <a href = vnd.unilang:im.html>im</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> pjátʹ</b> rubléj.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:give.html>gave</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:them.html>them</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:five.html>five</a></b> rubles <b><a href = vnd.unilang:each.html>each</a></b>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>да́л</a> им <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцати́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одному́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:рубль.html>рублю́</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ja.html>Ja</a> dal <a href = vnd.unilang:im.html>im</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> dvadcatí odnomú</b> rubljú.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:give.html>gave</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:them.html>them</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:twenty-one.html>twenty-one</a></b> rubles <b><a href = vnd.unilang:each.html>each</a></b>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Мы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отправить.html>отпра́вили</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́ка</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:my.html>My</a> otprávili <b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> trí</b> čelovéka.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:we.html>We</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:send.html>sent</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:three.html>three</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:man.html>men</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:each.html>each</a></b>.</span> (<span class="e-source"><a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>note</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:not.html>not</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:animate.html>animate</a> <b>*<a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>трёх</a></b></span>)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:associate.html>associated</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:if.html>if</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:any.html>any</a>, follows <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:normal.html>normal</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:rule.html>rules</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numeral</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:dative.html>dative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> compounds <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:three.html>three</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:four.html>four</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> compounds <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>these</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:other.html>other</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>cases</a>).</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>With</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tri</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>сто</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">sto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:not.html>not</a> compounds <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>these</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>numerals</a>), <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:stress.html>stress</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> optionally <a href = vnd.unilang:draw.html>drawn</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:onto.html>ontó</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b>:
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>да́л</a> им <b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b>/<b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:рубль.html>рубля́</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ja.html>Ja</a> dal <a href = vnd.unilang:im.html>im</a> <b>pó dva</b>/<b><a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> dvá</b> rubljá.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:give.html>gave</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:them.html>them</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a></b> rubles <b><a href = vnd.unilang:each.html>each</a></b>.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>Предло́г</a>; неизменяемое <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-по-</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

Астафьев</a>, «Пролетный <a href = vnd.unilang:гусь.html>гусь</a>», <span class="example-date">2000</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="книжное">книжн.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="канцелярское">канц.</span> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> предл. п.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:указывать.html>ука́зывает</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:временный.html>вре́менную</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пространственный.html>простра́нственную</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:граница.html>грани́цу</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>По</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:истечение.html>истече́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:всякое.html>вся́кого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полгода.html>полуго́да</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> ревизовал накопившуюся <a href = vnd.unilang:медный.html>ме́дную</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сумма.html>су́мму</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:заменять.html>заменя́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мелкий.html>ме́лким</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:серебро.html>серебро́м</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%92%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Гоголь, Николай Васильевич">Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. <li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дата.html>да́т</a>. п.</span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:указывать.html>ука́зывает</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предмет.html>предме́т</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:распространяться.html>распространя́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:работа.html>рабо́та</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:влияние.html>влия́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:действие.html>де́йствие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:деятельность.html>де́ятельность</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т. п. <a href = vnd.unilang:субъект.html>субъе́кта</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рамка.html>ра́мках</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́того</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:направление.html>направле́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:приоритетный.html>приорите́тными</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́гут</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:компания.html>компа́нии</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***побагроветь.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:побагроветь.html>побагрове́ть</a> (13388)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:получать.html>по-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">po-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:багроветь.html>багрове́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bagrovétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побагроветь.html>побагрове́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobagrovétʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:багроветь.html>багрове́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:grow.html>grow</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:turn.html>turn</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:crimson.html>crimson</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:purple.html>purple</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:redden.html>redden</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:flush.html>flush</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:побагроветь.html>побагрове́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гнев.html>гне́ва</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>pobagrovétʹ</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ot.html>ot</a> gnéva</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:flush.html>flush</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:anger.html>anger</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:turn.html>turn</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:purple.html>purple</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:rage.html>rage</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нет.html>нет</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:получать.html>по-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-баj-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ива</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать</b>

***побег.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:побег.html>побе́г</a> (4020)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побег.html>побе́г</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobég</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побег.html>побе́га</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побежать.html>побе́ги</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побег.html>побе́гов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:flight.html>flight</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:escape.html>escape</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:sprout.html>sprout</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:shoot.html>shoot</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:бег.html>бе́г</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:получать.html>по-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-бег-</b>; суффикс: <b>-∅</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***побегушки.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:побегушки.html>побегу́шки</a> (29989)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побегать.html>побе́гать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pobégatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-у́шки</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-úški</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побегушки.html>побегу́шки</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobegúški</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr> <abbr title="plural number">pl</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побегушки.html>побегу́шек</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:only.html>only</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:run.html>running</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:around.html>around</a></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:побегушки.html>побегу́шки</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> мн. lt;<a href = vnd.unilang:ж.html>ж</a> lt;3*agt;gt;  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> ед. ч. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуются</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.

***победа.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́да</a> (1145)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">побѣда</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">poběda</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:victory.html>victory</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:defeat.html>defeat</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́да</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobéda</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́ды</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́ды</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́д</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>бе́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>да</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-побед-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>О́бщее</a> прототипическое <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́ние</a> — <i><a href = vnd.unilang:достижение.html>достиже́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:преимущество.html>преиму́щества</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:иной.html>ино́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:цель.html>цели</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:результат.html>результа́те</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:преодоление.html>преодоле́ния</a> чего-либо</i>.
</p>

Ю. Юрский</a>, «Чернов», <span class="example-date">1972–1978 <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:победивший.html>победи́вший</a></b>

***победит.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́т</a> (16517)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́т</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobedít</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">third-person <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:future.html>future</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:indicative.html>indicative</a> perfective <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pobedítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid aaa; font-size: 90%; background: f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;"><a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a> Wikipedia <a href = vnd.unilang:have.html>has</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:article.html>article</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a>:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ru:%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82" class="extiw" title="w:ru:победит"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́т</a></a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ru:%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82" class="extiw" title="w:ru:победит">Wikipedia <sup>ru</sup></a></span></div>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́т</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobedít</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победит.html>победи́та</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победит.html>победи́ты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победит.html>победи́тов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/cemented_carbide" class="extiw" title="w:cemented carbide">cemented <a href = vnd.unilang:carbide.html>carbide</a></a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:alloy.html>alloy</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tungsten.html>tungsten</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:carbide.html>carbide</a>), pobedit</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>бе<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ди́т</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-побед-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ит</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:твердый.html>твёрдый</a> спечённый <a href = vnd.unilang:сплав.html>сплав</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:получаемый.html>получа́емый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:метод.html>ме́тодом</a> порошковой <a href = vnd.unilang:металлургия.html>металлурги́и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> монокарбида вольфрама (<a href = vnd.unilang:около.html>о́коло</a> 90%) <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> кобальта (<a href = vnd.unilang:около.html>о́коло</a> 10%) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>У</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:запас.html>запа́с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>есть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:коронка.html>коро́нка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:советский.html>сове́тским</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:победит.html>победи́том</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>таки́м</a> вольфрамовым <a href = vnd.unilang:сплав.html>спла́вом</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:поди.html>поди́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> хуже <a href = vnd.unilang:алмаз.html>алма́за</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Е. Ферсман, «<a href = vnd.unilang:воспоминание.html>Воспомина́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:камень.html>ка́мне</a>», <span class="example-date">1940</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:победительница.html>победи́тельница</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>была</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:известный.html>изве́стна</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:заранее.html>зара́нее</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:потому.html>потому́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:корона.html>коро́на</a> проплачена. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Мария Клапатнюк, «<a href = vnd.unilang:женщина.html>Же́нщина</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:краска.html>кра́ской</a>» // «<a href = vnd.unilang:новгородский.html>Новгоро́дские</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ведомость.html>ве́домости</a>», <span class="example-date">2003</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:победительница.html>победи́тельница</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:международный.html>междунаро́дной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:олимпиада.html>олимпиа́ды</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:биология.html>биоло́гии</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:торопиться.html>торо́пится</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:заявить.html>заяви́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сцена.html>сце́ны</a>: <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> России <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:никуда.html>никуда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уехать.html>уе́ду</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:здесь.html>здесь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бу́ду</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:востребованный.html>востре́бована</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Анатолий Кириллин, «<a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>собо́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:взять.html>возьму́</a>» // «<a href = vnd.unilang:сибирский.html>Сиби́рские</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:огонь.html>огни́</a>», <span class="example-date">2012</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; ***победить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́ть</a> (2424)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:беда.html>беда́</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bedá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">побѣдити</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">poběditi</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serbo-Croatian" class="extiw" title="w:Serbo-Croatian">Serbo-Croatian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="sh">побије́дити</i>/<i class="Latn mention" lang="sh">pobijéditi</i>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgarian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Bulgarian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:bulgarian.html>Bulgarian</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="bg">победя́</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="bg-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pobedjá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.

</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>бе<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ди́ть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4b.    <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>Образова́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:будущее.html>бу́дущего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a> 1-го <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лица</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:единственный.html>еди́нственного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>числа</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затруднённый.html>затруднено́</a>.  <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:побеждать.html>побежда́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-побед-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вино.html>ви́н</a>. п. <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:без.html>без</a> дополн.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:одержать.html>одержа́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:верх.html>верх</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:над.html>над</a> кем-либо, <a href = vnd.unilang:добиться.html>доби́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:успех.html>успе́ха</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сражение.html>сраже́нии</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:состязание.html>состяза́нии</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:противостояние.html>противостоя́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т. п. <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>тут</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ничто.html>ничего́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поделать.html>поде́лаешь</a>: <a href = vnd.unilang:хотеть.html>хо́чешь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:побеждать.html>побежда́ть</a> ― <a href = vnd.unilang:тренироваться.html>трениру́йся</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:добиваться.html>добива́йся</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чтобы.html>чтобы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>са́мым</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сильный.html>си́льным</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ловкий.html>ло́вким</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:способный.html>спосо́бным</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́ть</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:соперник.html>сопе́рника</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. ***победно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>победно</a> (15832)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pobédnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobédno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>triumphantly, victoriously</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побеждать.html>побежда́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobeždátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победитель.html>победи́тель</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedítelʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победительница.html>победи́тельница</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedítelʹnica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>победно</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

***победный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дный</a> (9182)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́да</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pobéda</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">pobédnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:triumphal.html>triumphal</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:triumphant.html>triumphant</a>, victorious
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дный</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:гимн.html>гимн</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>pobédnyj</b> gimn</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:triumphal.html>triumphal</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:hymn.html>hymn</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дный</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:клич.html>клич</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>pobédnyj</b> klič</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:triumphant.html>triumphant</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:call.html>call</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:победный.html>побе́дного</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:конец.html>конца́</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:do.html>do</a> <b>pobédnovo</b> koncá</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:till.html>till</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:final.html>final</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:victory.html>victory</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победа.html>побе́да</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobéda</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:побеждать.html>побежда́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobeždátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победить.html>победи́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победитель.html>победи́тель</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedítelʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победительница.html>победи́тельница</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedítelʹnica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:победоносный.html>победоно́сный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pobedonósnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:беда.html>бе́д</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-побед-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:беда.html>бе́д</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:получать.html>по-</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-бед-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

М. Достоевский</a>, «<a href="https://ru.wikisource.org/wiki/%D0%94%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B9%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA_(%D0%94%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9)" class="extiw" title="s:Двойник (Достоевский)"><a href = vnd.unilang:двойник.html>Двойни́к</a></a>», <span class="example-date">1846</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
